overview: Christian thought he was coming over to have lunch with his best friend, but his pal's mom decided to have his ass for desert. Nothing makes Kendra happier than being the first slut to shove a tongue up a young guy's ass! Courtknee's son's teacher had tp give him an "F" because he gave her and "A+" in ass-licking. Coach Lee came over to lay down the law with Raquel about her boy's behavior, but she showed him what being naughty is all about. Will always thought his buddy's mom Syren was sexy, so he jumped at the chance to try out Stoney's Ass Dressing on her before he pounded that slut doggie style!
tagline: "When You Kiss Your Mother You're Tasting My Asshole!"
title: Your Mom Tossed My Salad
